summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for a specific account over the month of December 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance, highlighting significant outgoing transfers to various entities.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

persons.name: Della Klein
persons.context: Della Klein is referenced in relation to an outgoing money transfer from the account.

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield serves as the account manager for Della Klein's account at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account had a beginning balance of $18,954,936.93.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $3,750,000.00 was made to Silicon Valley Bank.

events.title: Multiple Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Two outgoing transfers totaling $350,000.00 were made to Southern Trust Company.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $18,954,936.93 on December 1, 2016.
Significant outgoing transfers included $3,750,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank and $200,000.00 to Della Klein's account.
The ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2016, was $11,857,205.46.
Interest earned for the period was $2,268.53, with a year-to-date total of $587,991.85.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
